about_the_game:
Breakout Force is a culmination of quirky block-breaking games greatly inspired by Nights into Dreams and like-minded games from the 90s. Rack up points, maximize chains all before the timer runs out. The game will put your tactical and twitch reflex skills to the test, all in strobing Arcady style. Breakout Force contains two primary modules, "Armadillo Rush" and "Flash n Dash."

The Armadillo Rush module is a fast-paced sss... pinball / like platformer. Roll, jump or walk through nonstop cacti pandemonium.

With Flash n Dash, everything is lava. Did you enjoy that X O puzzle from Undertale? We made a whole game of it! The objective is to run over all blue squares, which in turn makes red squares and inhibits the player from backtracking. However, the player also holds a unique warping gambit, allowing for pure Awesomeness to incur.
detailed_description:
Breakout Force is a culmination of quirky block-breaking games greatly inspired by Nights into Dreams and like-minded games from the 90s. Rack up points, maximize chains all before the timer runs out. The game will put your tactical and twitch reflex skills to the test, all in strobing Arcady style. Breakout Force contains two primary modules, "Armadillo Rush" and "Flash n Dash."

The Armadillo Rush module is a fast-paced sss... pinball / like platformer. Roll, jump or walk through nonstop cacti pandemonium.

With Flash n Dash, everything is lava. Did you enjoy that X O puzzle from Undertale? We made a whole game of it! The objective is to run over all blue squares, which in turn makes red squares and inhibits the player from backtracking. However, the player also holds a unique warping gambit, allowing for pure Awesomeness to incur.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 2GB Memory
  • Storage: 769 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Graphics: Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 4GB Memory
  • Storage: 769 MB available space

name: BreakoutForce

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 3.2Ghz Dual Core or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 769 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.2Ghz Quad Core or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 769 MB available space

Rack up points, maximize chains all before the timer runs out. The game will put your tactical and twitch reflex skills to the test, all in strobing Arcady style.
